raw_body: PERERA – SENNEN (S.A PERERA) – Rev. Bro. Moderator,​ the past and present members of the charity organization,​ Mission to the Poorest Regina Mundi CLC are deeply saddened to hear the death of our former President Secretary and Treasurer,​ further Rtd. Chief Marine Engineer of the Colombo Port. Funeral will be notified in the papers once the children come from abroad. Tel. 0776133309.084816
